attributes.action: set up a government department for the issue of permits/licences for all road works and closures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the department would be responsible for the issue of permits and licences for all road works and closures by utility companies working on the roads of all major cities.and fixed penalties for over runs would be issued against those utility companies who fail to finish the authorised works within the given dates.these fines to be paid out of the utility companies profits and cannot be passed on to the bill payers.this department would also issue heavy fines for all unauthorised road closures and bad workmanship.
